name: Uwave
overview:
Uwave is an online noticeboard just for UK students. Students can buy, sell, trade textbooks, find housing, housemates & jobs within their University community.

Local and national job and housing providers are able to list to as few or as many Universities as they like.

It launched in 2011 as a beta at Oxford Brookes University and had a great reception with over 150 items posted on to the site after just two semesters. It was re-developed early 2012 and has expanded to more Universities around the UK.
